instructions: Tap the table. Do any of the following: Change the number of rows: Tap the Add Row button in the bottom-left corner of the table, then tap the arrows. Change the number of columns: Tap the Add Column button in the top-right corner of the table, then tap the arrows. Insert or delete a row or column within the table: Tap the row number or column letter, then tap Insert or Delete.
Tap the table, tap the Format button , tap Table, then tap Headers & Footer. Tap the Adjustable button next to a header or footer category.
